import React from"react";import{withScriptjs,withGoogleMap,GoogleMap}from"react-google-maps";import ShelterMarker from"./SheltersMarker";var SheltersMap=withScriptjs(withGoogleMap(function(props){var markers=props.shelters.map(function(doctor){return React.createElement(ShelterMarker,{key:doctor.uid,location:doctor.location,label:doctor.title});});return React.createElement(GoogleMap,{defaultZoom:15,defaultCenter:{lat:40.8075,lng:-73.9626}},markers);}));export default SheltersMap;
